summary: A young man in Uruguay has trouble expressing himself verbally. As the lead singer in a band, he interacts with the world through his music.
cast: Juan Andrés Stoll|Mario Stoll|Guillermo Stoll|Juan Carlos Garza|Martín Vergés|Leonor Courtoisie|Federico Veiroj|Alejandro Castiglioni|Vicky Anderson|Vicente Palleiro|Manolo Nieto|Javier Palleiro|Noelia Burlé
title: Hiroshima
